title: Melissa & Doug Dentist Kit for Kids, Educational Playset Age 3+, £16.99 at Amazon
text: Melissa & Doug Dentist Kit for Kids, Educational Playset Age 3+ [Shared by PancakeAlien](/@pancakealien) The Melissa & Doug Super Smile Dentist Kit for Kids, originally priced at £34.99, is currently available for £16.99. This 26-piece dental care play set aims to teach children aged 3 and up about good dental practices through realistic dentist role play. It features an over-sized set of pretend teeth, allowing young dentists to perform cleanings, treat cavities, and fit retainers and braces. Included accessories: - Dry-erase marker - Pick, mirror, and floss - Toothbrush and toothpaste tube - Dental rinse bottle and cup - 2 gauze pads - 3 tooth polish cups - Instrument tray - Top and bottom retainers and braces - Mask and reusable ID tag on a lanyard - Double-sided reusable activity card The play set is designed to be both fun and educational, easing fears associated with dentist visits and encouraging imaginative and empathetic play. Melissa & Doug, known for “the gold standard in early childhood play” as per NBC News, has partnered with the American Academy of Pediatrics to promote early brain development through play. ️ 4.6 / 5 based on 1,015 reviews [Kids Bracelet Making Kit: Arts & Crafts for Ages 4-11£14.99£8.994](/deals/kids-bracelet-making-kit-arts-crafts-ages-4-11-amazon) [Mini Basketball Hoop with Electronic Score, 3 Balls for Kids/Adults£35.79£14.2114](/deals/mini-basketball-hoop-electronic-score-3-balls-kidsadults-amazon) [Barbie Cook 'N Grill Restaurant Playset with 3 Dolls£43.329](/deals/barbie-cook-n-grill-restaurant-playset-3-dolls-argos-7670) [Regatta Kids Waterproof Jacket - Black, 7-8 Yrs£13.49£830](/deals/regatta-kids-waterproof-jacket-black-7-8-yrs-amazon) [Melissa & Doug Wooden Sandwich Toy Shop for Kids£49.99£24.9913](/deals/melissa-doug-wooden-sandwich-toy-shop-kids-amazon) - Need Amazon Prime?
